welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pingzhen, the charming city known for its vibrant culture and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here in Pingzhen!"

airports.airport_name: Taiwan Taoyuan International (Chiang Kai Shek International)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Taipei Songshan Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Taipei Songshan Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
